cause.description:
Using robots, space ships, lightsabers, and turkey sandwiches, we intend to go forth into the galaxy to explore and annex. Maybe form some sort of Republic along the way...you know, of the galactic sort.
1. Alien Friends are Good
2. Lightsabers are also good
3. People with the word "Darth" in their title must be stopped.
cause.mission: boldly go where no man has gone before...and annex it.
cause.name: Conquer the Universe
